name: Peanut Butter Pie
author: Charlotte Hooper
instructions: In saucepan combine sugar, cornstarch and salt. Gradually stir in milk. Cook and stir over medium heat until bubbly. Cook and stir 2 minutes more. Remove from heat. Stir small amount of hot mixture into beaten egg yolks. Immediately return to hot mixture. Cook for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Remove from heat and add peanut but- ter and vanilla. Pour into baked pie shell. Can top with Cool Whipwhen cooled.
